review: Easy setup and easy to use works great
author: Wayne sieve

review: Me and my kids LOVE this!!!!
author: Kierra Ashby

review: I love my fire stick so much I purchased a second one for another TV.  A week before purchasing the first fire stick I bought a google chromecast and it was very difficult to set-up and had to use my computer to control what was being streamed, now it is in a box in the gadget drawer.  The fire stick was awesome, just plug it in, enter passwords and a little cartoon guy pops up and explains everything.  Love the remote control feature.
author: basco

review: Need short remote function guide for setup not after you set it up.You also must follow plug in and connection exactly as stated in guide.Old movies free most new one you have to rent or buy.
author: B.D.
